attributes.action: Address Excessive Car Exhaust Noise From Modified and Replacement Car Exhausts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some time motorcycles have had a db noise limit on standard and after-market exhausts to eliminate nuisance. We call on the Government to apply this same requirement on car manufacturers and aftermarket / replacement car exhaust manufacturers for road use products. In addition the same penalty and enforcement for non-observation as that of motorbike owners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
